trans-unit.source: Freely definable prefix for invoice number (e.g. #IN00001).
trans-unit.target: Tovona azo faritana malalaka hoan'ny laharan'ny fakitiora (oh. #00001).

trans-unit.source: If required, show the total amount per rate of the corresponding tax.
trans-unit.target: Raha notakiana, dia mampiseho ny vola totaly isaky ny tahan'ny hetra mifanaraka aminy.

trans-unit.source: The next invoice will begin with this number, and then increase with each additional invoice. Set to 0 if you want to keep the current number (which is #%number%).
trans-unit.target: Ny fakitiora manaraka dia hanomboka amin'ito laharana ito, avy eo dia hitombo isaky ny misy fakitiora hafa. Farito ho 0 raha tianao hotazonina ny laharana ankitrio (izay #%number%).
